title: Playlist Numbers
body:
I was just wondering, being in OCE, that it can sometimes be a bit annoying and discouraging to pick some game modes or maps, because of the lack of knowledge of how many people will be playing in that mode or map.

I was just thinking why can't OCE specifically get a number near each mode, saying how many are in there, and if that's too intrusive, maybe a word, saying 'Many', 'Few' or 'Zounds', this issue hits me specifically in 'Team Builder' It says what captains are looking for but i still end up waiting much longer than other ques, so i don't really bother in anything but Normal Blind, since I know I'll find a game without much trouble.

replies.body: Heroes of might and magic term for a lot!
